headline: Adobe Systems (ADBE) Rises Higher Than Market: Key Facts
summary: Adobe Systems (ADBE) concluded the recent trading session at $420.76, signifying a +0.87% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Barclays Calls Adobe’s (ADBE) New Pricing Plan Supportive to Future Growth
summary: On May 16, Barclays analyst Saket Kalia praised Adobe Inc.’s (NASDAQ:ADBE) new pricing tiers for its Creative Cloud offerings. He believes that such pricing prudence should improve Adobe’s future growth. As per his analysis, the Pro tier represents a 17%-18% price increase for this offering, and on the other hand, the Standard tier offers an […]

headline: Adobe (ADBE) Stock Rises As Analysts Back Price Hike Move
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) shares rose 3% on May 16 after analyst firm Jefferies maintained its Buy rating for the company’s stock with a $590 price target. Following the announcement of a price increase for its Creative Cloud All Apps plans, which will take effect on June 17 or upon subscription renewal, analyst Brent Thill expressed […]

headline: 3 Nasdaq 100 Stocks for Long-Term Investors
summary: The biggest names in tech, e-commerce, and digital transformation are in the Nasdaq 100 (^NDX), but only a few are leading the pack. Some companies in this index are proving their resilience and expanding their competitive advantages.
